products.title: Crushed Velvet Pearl Roman Blind
products.description: An affordable alternative to velvet, their velour fabrics bring elegance and rich texture to your home. Produced in yorkshire, we've included soft shades in their collection which tie in with any theme. Elegant pearl roman blinds, a median between their white and ivory, uses a light touch of cream to create a soft off-white tone. Product id: db-rom0867 fabric colour: pearl material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Crushed Velvet Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: An affordable alternative to velvet, their velour fabrics bring elegance and rich texture to your home. Produced in yorkshire, we've included soft shades in their collection which tie in with any theme. Ivory roman blinds allow a light an airy feel whilst using a light splash of cream to retain an element of warmth. Product id: db-rom0863 fabric colour: ivory material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.
